{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AeroScout |model=Exciter EX |revision=2000-BW |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/12/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=RFID scanner |fcc_id=Q3HEX2000BW |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN210;CN210-166BG276-G; |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320B-70TCP |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128324A-6B |ram1_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3886 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3692 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161AEP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=RFID |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0C:CC |oui_eth=00:0C:CC }} [http://www.aeroscout.com/files/AeroScout%20Exciter%20Data%20Sheet.pdf Datasheet]
Per the label provided to the FCC, the OUI used by the unit is probably 00:0C:CC.
